entry.title: SNOW SQUALL WATCH , Gaspé
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:52 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, -3.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Gaspé Airport 11:00 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: -3.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.1 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 60 %
Wind Chill: -9
Dewpoint: -9.7°C
Wind: S 21 km/h gust 48 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: A few flurries. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this afternoon with a few flurries. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 12 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending this evening then clearing. Risk of snow squalls early this evening. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming west 20 km/h this evening. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 21 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023
